title: Unoptimization
description: The Unoptimization benchmark schema definition, describing the Unoptimization benchmark configuration.

benchmark_name.description: Name of the benchmark. Must be 'Unoptimization' for this schema.

shots.description: Number of measurement shots (repetitions) to use for the benchmark.

iterations.description: Number of unoptimization iterations to perform.

decomposition_method.description: Gate decomposition method used in quantum circuit unoptimization.

num_qubits.description: Number of qubits to use for the benchmark.
